statements: SELECT * FROM Students
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students
SELECT course_name, student_id, course_id FROM Students
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE course_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 3
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY student_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE course_id = 102 AND course_name = 'Math'
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT course_name, student_name FROM Students WHERE course_id = 103 ORDER BY student_name ASC
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE course_id = 1 ORDER BY student_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY course_name ASC
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Courses ON Students.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Students.student_id < 5 ORDER BY Students.student_id ASC
SELECT MAX(student_id) AS max_student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM Students
SELECT instructor, COUNT(*) AS total_courses FROM Courses GROUP BY instructor HAVING total_courses > 1 ORDER BY total_courses DESC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, grades FROM students WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT name, course_name FROM students JOIN courses ON students.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT name, instructor, description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM datasets WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE course_id > 100 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT dataset_name FROM datasets WHERE completed = TRUE AND student_id = 5;

SELECT s.name, c.course_name, d.dataset_name FROM students s INNER JOIN courses c ON s.course_id = c.course_id INNER JOIN datasets d ON s.id = d.student_id WHERE s.grades > 75 ORDER BY s.name ASC, c.course_name DESC, d.dataset_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM students;
SELECT * FROM data_sources;
SELECT id, source_name FROM data_sources WHERE data_type = 'CSV';
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT query_description AS description, query_result AS result FROM queries;
SELECT * FROM data_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe'
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT query_id, query_description FROM queries ORDER BY query_id ASC
SELECT data_type FROM data_sources GROUP BY data_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE course_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM courses ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE instructor_id = 2002;
SELECT instructor_name, specialty FROM instructors WHERE instructor_id = 2001;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses INNER JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id;

SELECT students.student_name, courses.course_name FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON courses.course_id = enrollments.course_id ORDER BY courses.start_date ASC;
SELECT assignments.assignment_name, due_date FROM assignments WHERE course_id = 201 ORDER BY due_date ASC;
